data.title: Avocado Weekly Movie Thread (8/6)
data.meta_description: The film adaptation of Harold and the Purple Crayon has caused great offense to lovers of children’s literature. Two weeks ago Brock Fistcrush brought up Dr Seuss and the terrible feature films adapted from his work. For today’s prompt: Which children’s books should stay out of the cinema? Which deserve a shot at adaptation?
data.text: The film adaptation of Harold and the Purple Crayon has caused great offense to lovers of children’s literature. Two weeks ago Brock Fistcrush brought up Dr Seuss and the terrible feature films adapted from his work. For today’s prompt: Which children’s books should stay out of the cinema? Which deserve a shot at adaptation?
